constraints.name: transformation
constraints.description: 可以对矩阵进行任意次数的操作，每次操作选择一个整数 k，然后对于每个索引 i (1 ≤ i ≤ n)，交换 A[i, k] 和 A[k, i]。注意 A[k, k] 保持不变。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose an integer k, then for each index i (1 ≤ i ≤ n), swap A[i, k] with A[k, i]. A[k, k] remains unchanged.

constraints.name: lexicographical_order
constraints.description: 目标是通过任意次数的操作，找到字典序最小的矩阵。
constraints.formal: Find the lexicographically smallest matrix after performing any number of operations.
